page.title: 09Capenhurst Family Life
page.content: Average family has two children many fathers out of work many are one parent families some have two working parents. Popular pets are dogs cats budgerigars & rabbits more exotic pets are spiders snakes & ferrets. Jobs in our area are mainly in farming and such factories as BNFL Shell Vauxhalls Main entertainment is provided by T.V. radio, video,computer,& tape recorder out of the home we have access to theatres, cinemas, greyhound racing speedway football whist discoes & night clubs. Shopping village fetes the seaside stately homes gardens zoos garden centres & show houses are popular outings.Family meals breakfast -cereals,toast.Main meal in evening, lunch time on Sunday.Many children take a packed lunch to school ,some have school dinners.Seaside holidays popular-many families go abroard.
